comments.author: Major Baleegh Ur Rehman
comments.content:
Here i will just tell u, if you people wanna travel again in this region of Pakistan starting from Dalbandin and onwards till Taftan and its surroundings, the best vehicle suited for your travelling is Toyota Land Cruiser 1999 model, 4Ã—4, 4.2 liters Diesel Engine, as this vehicle has the best traction. Its wheelbase and ground clearence is best suited for such like terrain. If you would have used this vehicle, you journey would have been much more comfortable. I have the vast experience of serving and doing patrolling in this area by driving more than 60,000 kms over a period of more than a year, and if i would be of any assistance do not hesitate to contact me. my e-mail is syedbaleegh@yahoo.com, with sincere regards

Major Baleegh Ur Rehman
